text_block_list.text:
One day, when I went to the trainer's room,
Matikanetannhauser was stuck to the wall,
flapping her hands.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I was becoming a spider.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, no! It's not like I've gone weird or anything!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There's a proper reason for this!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Since the festival is over,
how about a party combined with cherry blossom viewing?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Sounds good, sounds good! I'm looking forward to the cherry blossom viewing!
I want to bring a bento in a tiered box!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's fine too, but when it comes to cherry blossom viewing...
we have to do it, right? A one-act performance contest!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
--So, as my one-act performance,
I'm thinking of imitating a spider!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I think it'll catch everyone off guard!
Everyone knows I'm not good with spiders!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That said, it's hard to check if I'm doing it right
all by myself...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! If you don't mind,
could you watch me practice!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much!
Then, let's get started right away!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course, it's practice to become a spider!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Spiders spread their legs to look big, right?
I'm recreating that...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
For practice hanging from a high place,
there's only bungee jumping, right!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Here I go~! Heave! Heave--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Since I can't produce silk and make a web!
I thought I'd make a website instead!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Because 'web' means spider web,
so I thought it'd be the perfect substitute!!

And so, the days continued with her diligently practicing various spider poses.
What drives her to such lengths...
On this day as well, she was practicing poses in front of the mirror, but——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
No good~...!
It's not scary at all~...
choice_data_list: You don't have to be so down about it...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, I'm sure everyone will bring amazing party tricks...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Nature said before that she has lots of party trick masters!
And Turbo is a genius at making people laugh with her energy...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ikuno has high perfection in whatever she does, and above all, the gap with her poker face is sure to be a huge hit...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: With half-baked results like this, I can't compete. More than anything——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I'd feel bad for Nature and the others who are coming seriously!
I have to get better!
choice_data_list: You want to aim for perfection... I get it!
You want to aim for perfection... I get it!

text_block_list.text: If she's serious, then I should seriously practice being a spider with her!

After that, who knows how much time passed.
As she struck her umpteenth spider pose in front of the mirror——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmph! This time for sure, how about——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eeek, eeeeeek!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: S-s-scary! My movement just now, rustling like that, was just like a spider——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah——I did it... I did it!!
I became a perfect spider~!

And so, on the day of the festival after-party & cherry blossom viewing.
The party trick competition began.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmph! Shoo...!
Crack, crack, crack...!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha~!! That's it, that's it—!!
Machitan, so spider-like!!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Yes, especially the realism of the sound of the pedipalps rubbing is enough to give you goosebumps...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! It's similar, but~!
That's just too surreal~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! I did it~! A huge success~~~!!
Matikanetannhauser successfully performed a party trick she was fully satisfied with, managing to liven up the place.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Th-th-that's scary! My movements right now, all rustling... it's just like a spider!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah—I did it... I did it!! I've become a perfect spider!
And so, on the day of the festival after-party & cherry blossom viewing party. The one-act talent show began.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm! Shoo...! Crack, crack—
(Sssss...)
Then, at that moment... a small spider slowly descended from a cherry tree branch right in front of Matikanetannhauser's eyes...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeeeek!? A spiiiiiiider!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! Matitan, your face is hilarious!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Yes, it was truly an amusing funny face!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: —Wait, this is for real...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Waaah... This wasn't how it was supposed to go...!
The mood was lively, but things didn't go as planned for Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Th-th-that's scary! My movements were so spider-like, I surprised myself...!
choice_data_list: You can become even more spider-like!
You can become even more spider-like!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh! You're right! Since we're at it, let's become even more spider-like!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: To get closer to being a spider... I need to fully embody it, right!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: (I am a spider! I am a spider! I am a spider, I am a spider...)
The pose isn't much different from before, but there's a certain intimidating feel now... It's like being watched by a big spider. This is—
choice_data_list: You've become more spider-like than before!
You've become more spider-like than before!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yay! With this, I can surprise everyone at the one-act talent show!
After that, she successfully performed the spider imitation she practiced at the after-party, managing to liven up the mood.
